dialog: Ohohoho… So you've actually come. Good..
If you want your gear back you'll have to come to me! See you at the top, darling.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: That woman must've gotten that bandit to steal my gear!

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Ugh, no choice then.
You're doing better than I thought, Cassian.
Still have a while to the top though, ahahaha!

speaker: Cassian
dialog: She knows my name, is that why her smug face looks so familiar…

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Hey wait! Aren't you… Viola? Why are you doing all this?

speaker: Cassian
dialog: We haven't spoken since the break-up…

speaker: Viola
dialog: He actually remembers me? Wow! Wait, this isn't the time.

speaker: Viola
dialog: Quick! Think of something, me!

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Are you just being petty over the breakup or something?

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Didn't we talk this through already? I thought we agreed to be adults about this.

speaker: Viola
dialog: Um.. I- Uh- It-it doesn't matter!

speaker: Viola
dialog: You obviously need something from me now don't you? Just meet me at the top!

speaker: Cassian
dialog: What was that... Our breakup didn't end that badly did it?

speaker: Cassian
dialog: I don't remember doing anything. Guess it doesn't matter now.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: To the top I go.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: *Huff.. Huff..* THERE! I made it, Viola. Can I get my gear back now?

speaker: Viola
dialog: Hmph! I guess.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: You never answered my questions back there.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Why'd you do all this in the first place?

speaker: Viola
dialog: ...You're so unapproachable.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: What?

speaker: Viola
dialog: You're always alone! You never hang out with anyone, you're always sneaking off somewhere

speaker: Viola
dialog: (now I know it's here), and, well, I don't know! It's just weird!

speaker: Viola
dialog: I had to figure out some way to talk to you again, even if it meant doing all this.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Huh. You really do still care about me through all this mess, huh.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Well, you could've just come up and talked to me, you know.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: I come out here because I just really like fishing, and it's quiet out here.

speaker: Viola
dialog: Of course I still care! It's not like I hate you or anything.. I mean, if you don't either,

speaker: Viola
dialog: maybe we can..hang out more often? Try again? We could go out somewhere ni-

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Yeaaah, no. Honestly, after all this, I really don't want to hang out with you.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Climbing this tower was a lot of work, I was freaking out about my gear the whole time,

speaker: Cassian
dialog: And I know you hired that guy to steal it.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: That was really weird and kinda creepy to be honest, and now I just want to get my stuff and go.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: So I'm going to do that.

speaker: Cassian
dialog: Bye.

speaker: Viola
dialog: W-wait hold on bu-
